val:
Product Manager (June 2025 - Present)

  • Defined and prioritized product roadmaps for IRIS LMS, Peridot Mobile App, and MSMETV, ensuring feature development aligned with market demands, user feedback, and strategic business objectives.

  • Spearheaded AI/ML enhancement initiatives in IRIS LMS, implementing auto-reading of notices, auto-summarization, and auto-drafting of replies, leading to a 40% improvement in processing efficiency.

  • Conducted market research, competitor benchmarking, and user interviews for IRIS LMS to identify growth opportunities, refine product positioning, and guide feature prioritization.

  • Drove the development and launch of the Peridot Mobile App, enhancing user engagement and accessibility for compliance and tax filing services.

  • Supported the initial conceptualization and content strategy of MSMETV, a digital media initiative designed to provide MSMEs with relevant industry insights and regulatory updates.
